amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit use of funds by the DEA to enforce inspections of physicians who prescribe buprenorphine for treatment of patients who are at-risk of addiction.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds for any inspection under the Controlled Substances Act with respect to narcotic drugs or combinations of such drugs, being dispensed for maintenance or detoxification treatment.
